channel.title: zoom on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in zoom on Barefoot Rob

item.title: BC NWTA 3 weeks out
item.description: 22:03 Wednesday 27 February 2019 JST Today was the 3-weeks-out meeting for we staff of the New Warrior Training Adventure (NWTA) in British Columbia, Canada. It was a good meeting; we each have a buddy and each man on the call checked in for his buddy, with the presumption that the buddies have been in touch with each other. I was inspired after the call and reached out to my two teams via email.

item.title: new 56k modem
item.description: Explore the Internet at Breakthrough Speed! Saturday 28 March 1998 Yesterday at work I got a new super fast modem for my computer at home. 56k!!!! My excitement is fake. I currently have an ISDN line that work will no longer pay for. I am slowly being weaned off the internet.. (??) I'm using ISDN now. We'll see if installation of this new modem is as easy as the box says.
